A

Action - Interface in menuClasses
Any object of this type must have a method that executes necessary algorithm to carry-out the action it represents.
activate() - Method in class menuClasses.Menu
Activates the menu: displays the different options, request a selection from user, validate, and return the option corresponding to the user's selection.
addCo(String, String, double, int) - Method in class dataManager.DMComponent
Adds a new Company to the system
AddCoAction - Class in menuClasses
